title: COP26 Live Updates: Draft of Glasgow Climate Accord Calls for Tougher Action
content:
1. COP26 Live Updates: Draft of Glasgow Climate Accord Calls for Tougher Action  The New York Times
  2. LIVE: UK Prime Minister Johnson speaks at COP26  Reuters
  3. COP26: PM calls on nations to pull out the stops as draft agreement published  BBC News
  4. Without a healthy democracy, we have no hope of achieving climate justice  The Independent
  5. COP26 in Glasgow: As UN climate talks wrap, these 4 fights remain  The Washington Post
